name: Exchanging Souls
text: During the Main Phase: Immediately after this effect resolves, Tribute Summon 1 Divine-Beast monster. When you do, you can also Tribute monsters your opponent controls even though you do not control them, but if you do, until the end of the next turn after this card resolves, you can only activate 1 card or effect per turn other than Divine-Beast monsters' effects. You can only activate 1 "Exchanging Souls" per turn.
